text: Hey Folks, I hope you guys are doing great. I want to use HubSpot Calling Extension SDK to integrate with Genisys PureCloud. I tried the public documentation provided by HubSpot for this but unable to understand how to work through it and build an app. Can you guys share some technical resources other than Github repo and introductory docs of HubSpot so that I can get started. Thanks in advance.

from HubSpot import HubSpot

api_client = HubSpot(api_key="you_api_key")

all_contacts = api_client.crm.contacts.get_all()
all_contacts
